channel.title: Microsoft on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft on Blog

item.title: Microsoft Edge moves to Chromium in 2019
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers’ elaboration Microsoft annonces officialy that Edge will become a Chromium-based browser in early 2019! Microsoft is reworking its Edge browser on Windows 10 so that it will based on the Chromium open source project. Microsoft CVP Joe Belfiore made a big announcement and explained that it was all about creating â€œbetter web compatibility for our customers and less fragmentation of the web for all web developers.
